mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) as total, sum(case when bi.run_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as normal, sum(case when bi.run_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as alarm, sum(case when bi.run_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as offline FROM box_index bi
bi.is_deleted = 0 and bi.box_type = 0

select sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as smallCurrent, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as lessFifteen, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterFifteen, sum(case when cur_unbalance_status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterThirty from box_index
is_deleted =0 and box_type =0

SELECT sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as LoadRateZero, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as lessThirty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterThirty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterSixty, sum(case when bi.load_rate_status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as greaterNinety FROM box_index bi
is_deleted = 0 and box_type =0

SELECT count(1) as total, sum(case when bi.run_status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as normal, sum(case when bi.run_status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as alarm, sum(case when bi.run_status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as offline FROM box_index bi
bi.is_deleted = 0

select t1.id as id, t1.box_key as `unique`, concat(t1.box_key,'-',t1.box_name) as `name`, '7' as type, '6' as parentType from box_index t1
t1.is_deleted = 0
NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (
SELECT #{key} AS box_key
) t2 WHERE t2.box_key = t1.box_key )

select box_key from box_index where is_deleted = 0
and box_key like concat(#{key},'%')
GROUP BY ip_addr,box_key
limit 50
select box_name as name from box_index bi left join bus_index bi2 on bi.box_key = bi2.box_key where id = #{boxId}
